name: Bink's Amazing Adventure
description:
WIP Ludum Dare Mini #64 game inspired by N64 Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

Mouse To Look About.

WASD to move player.

Space Bar Jumps.

In Fishing Mode LMB to reel in, RMB to reel out.

In Archery Mode LMB and hold to Nock and Draw Arrow, Release to shoot. RMB to unload arrow.

Any and all feedback welcome.
